�Grizzltron�


   A Stasis Pod glimmers in the moon light as it flies toward the Earth.  It 
lands down near a cave in Canada.  The Stasis Pod opens up and out pops a 
huge figure.

   "Beast Mode."

   The Figure then turning into a Grizzly Bear runs into the cave and waits 
for a Bot to come and check out this need Stasis Pod.  He was just waiting 
to ambush who ever came.
